page.title: 13Customs.
page.content: Every year, the people of the community organise the Whitchurch Festival Week.It usually takes place in July and lasts for about a week and consists of many varied events designed to involve as many people as possible.Activities take place at different centres such as the ground of Whitchurch Hospital.Events organised include a carnival and procession with floats through the village led by the newly chosen "Miss Whitchurch" and her attendants.Other activities include art exhibitions at local schools,a fete,sports,concerts, competitions and displays such as Scottish Dancing.Organisations such as Girl Guides,Brownies,Boy Scouts and Boys Brigades all take part.The money raised during the week is used to benefit certain groups within the community.
